body:
Yep, Barcelona vs Real Madrid for the second time this season. This time at the Camp Nou

Barcelona starting XI: Bravo, Alves, Piqué, Mathieu, Alba, Busquets, Rakitic, Iniesta, Neymar, Messi, Suárez.

Real Madrid starting XI: Casillas, Carvajal, Pepe, Ramos, Marcelo, Kroos, Modric, Isco, Bale, Ronaldo, Benzema.

The previous El Clasico was a 3-1 victory to Real Madrid

Barcelona have been undefeated in their last 10 matches.
Real Madrid have had 1 loss and 1 draw in their last 10 matches.

I personally think that Barca will win this one, they've been in great form in their last matches. Messi, Neymar, and Suarez have been working better than Bale, Benzema, and Cristiano in my opinion. 

I think the score will be 2-1 to Barcelona. Let me know what you guys think the winner and the score will be in this El Clasico.

title: El Clasico #2!

replies.body:
Goal! 1-0 Barcelona! Jeremy Mathieu scored!

[Edit] It's 1-1! Ronaldo scored!
